title: Out of Memory
body:
#### System information

Geth version: Geth/v1.6.6-stable-10a45cb5/windows-386/go1.8.3
OS & Version: Win 10
64GB RAM

#### Expected behaviour
Bock Chain Sync

#### Actual behaviour
fatal error: out of memory

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Start geth.
If I start it with --cache 16 it will usually run longer before crashing. But still crashes within 30 minutes. Without it it usually only lasts 2 minutes. Either way, extremely slow block downloads.
